```{r}
library(targets)
library(tidyverse)
library(fabletools)
tar_load(c(
  fc_sol_rad,
  daily_test
  ))
```

What would be cool here is a table with variable name and check or red x for pass or fail QA.  These would have links to relevant sections below with plots and tables.


```{r}
x <- 
  fc_sol_rad |>
  hilo(c(95, 99)) |> 
  select(-sol_rad_total, -.model) |> 
  mutate(across(where(~inherits(., "hilo")), ~round(., 3)))

y <-
  tar_read(daily_test) |>
  select(sol_rad_total)

right_join(x,y, by = c("meta_station_id", "meta_station_name", "datetime")) |> 
  select(meta_station_id, meta_station_name, datetime, sol_rad_total, forecast = .mean)
```
